BilderBox - The heart of the system

BilderBox houses all of the Bilder famliy as well as storage and processing power.

Easy import

Quickly add all of your existing photos to BilderBox, no matter how you store them now.

Storage under your control

Your photos stay local in your BilderBox. Simply connect it to home WiFi to access your library anywhere.

State of the art Backups

BilderBox is equipped with two drives with a mirrored filesystem. They are also user exchangable.

BilderBook - Digital photo album

BilderBook combines the best from the digital and analogue world

Beautiful layouts

Pick BilderBook up anytime and enjoy a random photo collection, displayed in a beautiful, premade layout.

Ingenious hinge design

10 flexible, ulrathin OLED screens make BilderBook possible. Enclosed in an ingenious hinge.

Choose your collections

Want to view a specific collection in BilderBook? No problem, just choose it in the app and get going.

BilderBeam - Mini photo projector

Show the your photos in big-picture style with BilderBeam.

Hassle-free diashows

Quick to set up, ultra-portable, 3h battery life on a charge. What do you need more to enjoy your photos with friends?

Adjustable lens

No matter where you place BilderBeam, you always get the best picture. This little slider lets you control the angle of projection.

Always in control

When projecting photos with BilderBeam, choose what collections or photos to show with BilderApps on your favourite device.

BilderScan - portable photo scanner

The most comfortable way to digitize your photos.

Scan prints & albums

BilderScan allows you to quickly scan your paper photos. Just swipe the scanner over any photo print or album and the scanned photos will show up in your library instantly.

Negatives & Slides

Get high quality scans of your negatives and slides with the film scan rack. Supports 35mm negative and posititve film.

Silde it through

After loading the film scan rack, just slide in through the scan area in BilderBox. Scanned photos will be added to your library.

Tired of cluttered photo libraries?

Buy your BilderBox now and get an exclusive Early-Bird offer.
